alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 9:02AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Susquehanna, southeastern Bradford and western Wyoming Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 901 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lovelton, or 10 miles southeast of Wyalusing, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tunkhannock, Hollenback, Noxen, Mehoopany, Meshoppen, Forkston, Laceyville, Kasson Brook, Osterhout and Evans Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
